body.name: Micomlan Led Desk Lamp with Clamp, Architect Desk Lamp for Home Office with Atmosphere Lighting, 24W Ultra Bright Auto Dimming Desk Light Stepless Dimming and Tempering LED Table Light
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 41 mins
features: 【7 Rotatable Joints】: Micomlan swing arms led desk light features 7 strongly damped joints with 3 ultra bright light bars design for freely vertical adjustment and horizontal adjustment. You can rotate the bilateral light bars vertically to change the illumination angle. Turn them up to expand the lighting coverage to illuminates your entire desk or turn them down to create a super bright lighting area for sewing crafting. You can also rotate the base to adjust the light direction and position.

【45°Angled Away Asymmetric Light】: The main light of the clamp light adopts 45° angled away LEDs and side lighting design, it only illuminates your desk and keyborad rather than your screens and eyes. This will significantly reduce the reflected glare on your screen and protect your eyes from fatigue. This office light is suitable for reading, studying, drawing, painting, design and art work.

【Ambient Lighting & Smart Light Sensor】: When the bilateral auxiliary lights shine upwards, they can work as ambient lights to relieve eye strain. The built in light sensor will automatically adjust the brightness accordingly to a comfortable level depending on the surrounding light. The main light and the auxiliary lights of the office lamp need to be turned on or off separately, but the brightness and color temperatures are controlled together.

【CRI>90 Eye Protection Technology】: Micomlan 24W table lamp is equipped with high color rendering index LEDs(CRI>90) to generate soft flicker-free and anti-glare light and accurately render colors, close to the natural light and less blue light hazard. You won't get tired with prolonged use. You can also rotate the left auxiliary light down for eliminating shadows.

【Multiple Lighting Combinations】: Micomlan office desk lamp provides a wide range of brightness adjustment, including multiple color settings across a white-and-yellow spectrum. You can click the touch panel to adjust the 5 levels of brightness and color temperatures step by step, or you can long press the panel for stepless dimming (20% - 100%) and stepless tempering (3000K - 6500K). The memory function will restore your last setting.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Micomlan rotatable desk lamp features 3 ultra bright light bars design for freely vertical adjustment and horizontal adjustment. You can turn the bilateral light bars up to expand the lighting coverage up to 80 inches. Perfect for large desktop with multiple monitors.

When you need to focus light on sewing, drawing or handcrafting, you can rotate the bilateral light bars down to create a super bright lighting area. Or you can just rotate one light bar down for eliminating shadows. The metal base can be rotated by 360°to freely change the lighting position.
When the bilateral light bars shine upwards, they can work as ambient lights to relieve your eye strain.

The controls are very responsive and require only the lightest touch to activate. The main light and the auxiliary lights need to be turned on or off separately, but the brightness and color temperatures are controlled together. The advanced light sensor will detect the level of ambient light in your room and adjust the brightness accordingly to a comfortable level.
Micomlan office desk lamp adopts eye-caring technology to protect your eyes from strain

Space-saving clamp supports up to 2.5 inches of the desktop. It takes up less than 4 square inches of space on your desktop.High strength nylon joints are stiff enough that they hold the desired angle without wobbling.All aluminum lamp body, sits very stable on your desk. It can go easily in a high-end modern office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The desk lamp is very customizable. It has multipoints of articulation allowing left-right, and up-down movements. The different levels of brightness and various light modes are additional features that make this lamp worth buying. Having the options of turning on the center light only, the outer lights only, or all three are rather useful and convenient. Good quality and the clamp stays sturdily in place when moving the lamp to one's preference. The foot print of the clamp is relatively small, which is a plus.One recommendation would be to have two buttons controlling the level of brightness instead of one, one button to increase and the other to decrease the level. Cycling through the brightness levels can be a little annoying, but not enough to enjoy the desk lamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Lamp, Many Lightning Options
reviews.reviewText: This is a great desk lamp and I highly recommend it.Leave it folded and only turn on the wing lights to get some back lighting or turn on the main light to get direct desk lighting, if that’s not enough you can fold the wings downward to provide even more desk light. There are controls to adjust brightness and cool/warmth of the lights and the main light and wing lights have separate controls so there are so many combinations of lighting based on need.I have a tall, wide monitor so I was worried about the lamp being tall enough to reach over it but the lamp does and has room to spare. You can make it as short or tall as you need.Also, I have a glass top desk and it attaches perfectly and has been doing great for months. Really love this light. It is excellent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Higher quality than I was expecting.
reviews.reviewText: The construction of this light is fairly sturdy. The clamp is thick metal and can apply some real clamping force without bending. The hinges are all nice and stiff so you won’t have to worry about it sagging. The lights are extremely bright on the highest setting. It’s nice to have 5 levels to choose from. The buttons are capacitive touch but they are very responsive and have reacted to every touch so far. I have only just started using this light but overall, I am very pleased with it! As a bonus, the instructions are actually written in proper English!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very impressive in how it attaches easily and adjusts to the desired position without having to be repositioned every time. Great flexibility in the lighting settings. The wing lights are much more useful than I thought they would be. Would definitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's actually good
reviews.reviewText: That's right, it's actually a good lamp. Not only would I buy it again, I am going to buy another one because when my wife saw it, she wanted it. The the lamp arm is flexible and stiff enough to hold the lamp where you place it. The different light temps are nice. I can't figure out how to get the ambient light to work but it's fine because the color temps can be changed. There are two power buttons so you can use the inside and outside lights independently. This is a good lamp. Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A very cool lamp. Offers great flexibility.
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised with this light. I previously had a desk lamp that would only light up one side of my desk. This light mounts to the back of my table behind my monitor. It has lots of axis points so it's ultra configurable in terms of height, depth and angle. And, the lighting is also configurable. Temperature (3000-6500k), brightness can all be changed and it has an auto sense feature (can be turned on/off) for ambient light. Now, I have light over my entire workspace. It's a bit "art-deco" which is kind of cool (my wife said it looks like a drone). I'd definitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All-in-one for a steal
reviews.reviewText: It illuminates my work area perfectly and there are so many ways to adjust the angle and lighting mood. You can flip the side lights towards the ceiling and you get a very nice ambient lighting. Probably a thousand ways to play around. You can flip it sideways, forward, backwards, turn it around, swivel it upwards, downwards. The side lights move independently as well.Some of the features I really like:1) There are 2 different on/off switches, one for the main light (the one in the middle) and one for the side lights. So you can turn on both, or just either one. It's so versatile.2) 5 different color temperature adjustment (3000K all the way to 6500K)3) 5 different Brightness levels adjustments (20% to 100%)4) There is also an auto adjust brightness setting which you can enable or disable5) All controls are conveniently located on the front of the lamp and they are touch-sensitive. You don't have to press down hard. Just a tap of your finger is enough to command.I also have 2x 'BenQ ScreenBar Halo' that I bought for my PC monitors. But each one of those are easily 3x more expensive than this product. You're basically getting this product at a super steal. If you're hesitating on getting em', just do it. Zero regrets on getting em'.

reviews.reviewerName: John W. Roberts, Jr.John W. Roberts, Jr.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product Works well
reviews.reviewText: Easy set up overall. Good range of light temperatures. Highly adjustable positions that provide good lighting of work area with wide range of brightness. Better coverage than the two older lights that you can see sitting on top pf my monitors.

reviews.reviewTitle: The best desk lamp I have ever had
reviews.reviewText: The slim profile, sleek design, and flexible arms of this desk lamp make it very convenient to affix it to my desk. It does not take up much desk space and provides light for a wide area on my desk. Even the lowest brightness setting is sufficient for my work, so brightness is not an issue. This is the best desk lamp I have ever had, and I am glad I purchased it.

This light is outstanding! Excellent quality with various brightness settings and warm/cool adjustments. The arms adjust smoothly and hold their setting very well. Highly versatile and top quality product. This light is perfect for the drafting architectural desk we got our daughter. Very happy with this purchase.

Heavy duty item. Hinges and clasp is super sturdy. The best part is the angle of light adjustment. Slightly shine inwards so doesn’t shine in my eye. Then the brightness and whiteness can be adjusted. Probably my Best Buy on Amazon this year so far. Once in awhile find a really good item on Amazon.
Great lamp. Very versatileBrightness much improved over previous light.Lots of colour and Brightness options.Recommend
This is a great light, very flexible and covers a large desk.A little on the costly side, but it is a good light.
